appendText.text: Specs: Dimensions: 72" x 26" x 5mm Weight: 9 lbs Material: Sustainably sourced cork and natural tree rubber Features: Built-in alignment lines, non-slip surface Allow the mat to air dry completely before rolling it up. Always roll it up with the cork side facing outwards. Avoid prolonged exposure to sunlight; store in a shaded area. Clean with a damp cloth, mild soap, and warm water. Earthy Comfort : The cork surface yoga mat provides a soft yet firm texture for excellent joint cushioning. Spine Aligned: Built-in alignment lines help improve posture. Bigger & Thicker: This durable cork yoga mat for all levels of practice features a spacious design for extra support . Non-Slip Performance : Enjoy the superior performance of this sustainable cork yoga mat with a non-slip surface, ensuring stability during practice. Durable & Sustainable : Made from sustainably sourced cork and natural rubber, our product is an eco-conscious choice . Ideal for home use, it offers both comfortable cork surface benefits and exceptional grip.
